title: sangItAnjali sheiguvOm
sahitya:
sangItAnjali sheiguvOm shiva SaNmukhanukku shuddha hrdaya guhanukkE nAm


anupallavi

  tambUrA kuzhal vINai tALa mELangaLuDan sa ri ga ma pa dha ni enum sapta svara vEdattAl


caraNam    sendil ANDavan vIra dEvasEnAdhipan shen kadir vElavan dhIran jnAna pradIpan
kandan vaLLi deivAnai kAntan karuNai vEndan gAngEyan aDiyArait-tAngum kumaranukkE
